question: Does cortical spreading depression appear in ischemic penumbra following ischemic stroke?
ideal_answer: Yes, cortical spreading depression appears in ischemic penumbra following ischemic stroke and is associated with expansion of ischemic injury. This has been shown in humans and in animal models.
